Deck1_5Any_1.text: Intrigue: Choose a region. You may move 5 {0} from this region to other regions.

Deck1_5Any_2.text: Intrigue: Choose a region. You may move 5 {0} from this region to other regions.

Deck1_4Self.text: Intrigue: You may move 4 of your {0}.

Deck1_2And2_1.text: Intrigue: You may move 2 of your {0} and 2 foreign {0}.

Deck1_2And2_2.text: Intrigue: You may move 2 of your {0} and 2 foreign {0}.

Deck1_Add.text: Intrigue: You may place 2 additional {0} from your {1} into the region(s) of your choice.

Deck1_Or.text: Intrigue: You may move all your {0} away from one region OR You may place 2 {0} from your {1} into the region(s) of your choice.

Deck1_Allself.text: Intrigue: You may move all your {0} away from one region.

Deck2_Provinceone.text: You may return 1 {0} of each opponent to the {1}. These {2} must come from regions.

Deck2_Decay.text: Decay of Authority: Each of your opponents must return 3 {0} in their {1} to the {2}.

Deck2_Angry.text: Angry King!: In clockwise order, each of your opponents must return 3 of their {0} to the {1}. These {0} may come from their {2} and/or a region on the board.

Deck2_Decayall.text: Decay of Authority: Each of your opponents must return all {0} in their {1} to the {2}.

Deck2_Choose_1.text: Special Scoring: Choose a region to be scored immediately.

Deck2_Choose_2.text: Special Scoring: Choose a region to be scored immediately.

Deck2_Choose_3.text: Special Scoring: Choose a region to be scored immediately.

Deck2_Province.text: Each player chooses a region (where they have at least 2 {0}) with their secret disc. Each player must return 2 of their {0} from their chosen region to the {1}.

Deck2_Provinceall.text: Each player chooses a region (where they have at least one {0}) with their secret disc. Each player must return all their {1} from their chosen region to the {2}.

Deck3_Fives_1.text: Special Scoring: All 5-point regions are scored immediately.

Deck3_Fives_2.text: Special Scoring: All 5-point regions are scored immediately.

Deck3_Fours_1.text: Special Scoring: All 4-point regions are scored immediately.

Deck3_Fours_2.text: Special Scoring: All 4-point regions are scored immediately.

Deck3_Choose.text: Special Scoring: Choose a region to be scored immediately.

Deck3_Castillo_1.text: Special Scoring: The Castillo is scored immediately.

Deck3_Castillo_2.text: Special Scoring: The Castillo is scored immediately.

Deck3_Firsts.text: Special Scoring: All regions are scored immediately. Only first place scores points. In case of a tie, no points are scored.

Deck3_Least.text: Special Scoring: All regions with the least {0} are scored immediately. Regions containing no {0} do not count.

Deck3_SixSevens.text: Special Scoring: All 6- and 7-point regions are scored immediately.
Deck3_SixSevens.explain: Useful for players dominant in the relevant regions

Deck3_Most.text: Special Scoring: All regions with the most {0} are scored immediately.

Deck4_Scoreboard_1.text: Mobile Scoreboard: You may place a new mobile scoreboard OR move an existing one.

Deck4_Scoreboard_2.text: Mobile Scoreboard: You may place a new mobile scoreboard OR move an existing one.

Deck4_Scoreboard_3.text: Mobile Scoreboard: You may place a new mobile scoreboard OR move an existing one.

Deck4_Power_1.text: Power of the Cards: You may return 1 of your used Power cards to your hand.

Deck4_Power_2.text: Power of the Cards: You may return 1 of your used Power cards to your hand.

Deck4_Eviction.text: Eviction: Choose a region. Each of your opponents chooses a region on their secret disc. Each of your opponents moves all their {0} from this region to their chosen region.

Deck4_Court.text: The Court: You may take 2 {0} from the {1} into your {2}.

Deck4_Grande_1.text: Grande: You may move your Grande.
Deck4_Grande_1.explain: Useful for maximising value of uncontested regions where player is dominant

Deck4_Grande_2.text: Grande: You may move your Grande.
Deck4_Grande_2.explain: Useful for maximising value of uncontested regions where player is dominant

Deck4_Special.text: Special Scoring: Each player chooses a region with their secret disc. Each region chosen exactly once is immediately scored. Regions not chosen or chosen more than once are not scored.

Deck4_Advisor.text: Royal Advisor: You may move the {0} to an adjacent region.

Deck5_King.text: King's Card: You may move the {0} to any region.
